    domain = mail.split('@')[1]
    print(domain)

    word = 'Iran'
    sent = 'Iranian Artificial Intelligence Society'
    return word in sent

source.282c38e6:
def checkBirthday(speed , date):
    seed = 0
    birthday = '1310/11/12'
    seed +=5 if date == birthday else 0
    checkSpeed(speed , seed)
    
def checkSpeed(speed,seed):
    print("No Ticket") if (speed <= (60 + seed)) else False
    print("Small Ticket") if (speed > (60 + seed)) and (speed <= (80 + seed)) else False
    print("Big Ticket") if (speed > (80 + seed)) else False
        
checkBirthday(81,'1310/11/12') # small
checkBirthday(81,'1400/08/14') # big
